member.name: T:Quasar.RevitNodes
member.summary: Quasar RevitNodes Class All Quaser Revit nodes will be under this class.

member.name: M:Quasar.RevitNodes.CopyPasteFilter(Revit.Elements.Views.View,System.Collections.Generic.List{Revit.Elements.Views.View})
member.summary: Copy filters and override graphic settings from a view and paste its to views.

member.name: M:Quasar.RevitNodes.HideUnHideElement(System.Collections.Generic.List{Revit.Elements.Element},System.Collections.Generic.List{Revit.Elements.Element},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Elements hide/unhide in given view. Default value is true(hide).

member.name: M:Quasar.RevitNodes.FloorPlanViewByRoom(Revit.Elements.Element,System.Collections.Generic.List{Revit.Elements.Room},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Double)
member.summary: Create floor plan views by rooms, names and offset.
member.param: List of names for new views

member.name: M:Quasar.RevitNodes.ThreeDViewByRoom(System.Collections.Generic.List{Revit.Elements.Room},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Double)
member.param: Offset value for section box. Default is 500.

member.name: M:Quasar.RevitNodes.CeilingViewByRoom(Revit.Elements.Element,System.Collections.Generic.List{Revit.Elements.Room},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Double)
member.summary: Create ceiling views by rooms, names and offset.
member.param: List of names for new views

member.name: M:Quasar.RevitNodes.ElevationInRoom(System.Collections.Generic.List{Revit.Elements.Room},Revit.Elements.Element,System.Double)
member.summary: Create elevation views in room with crop offset by rooms , floorplan and offset. Default naming is - "RoomName_RoomNumber - A", "RoomName_RoomNumber - B", "RoomName_RoomNumber - C", "RoomName_RoomNumber - D".
member.param: Room elements and make sure all room are bounding

member.name: M:Quasar.RevitNodes.LinkLevelGrid(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Hide/Unhide levels and grids from link documents.

member.name: M:Quasar.RevitNodes.GetBuiltInParameterName(Revit.Elements.Element,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Built-In Parameter Name by element and parameter(s).
member.returns: Each list contains [0] ParameterName [1] BuiltIn ParameterName
